_comment2: five Theros booster packs and a seeded booster pack
_comment4: player Chooses a Path: Path of Honor (White), Path of Wisdom (Blue), Path of Ambition (Black), Path of Battle (Red), Path of Might (Green)
_comment5: Each Prerelease pack contains one Hero card (respectively the Protector, the Philosopher, the Avenger, the Warrior and the Hunter), which isnâ€™t for use at the Prerelease. The pack also contains a playable Prerelease promo

querySet.query: from[{{setCode}}]?token=true
from[*]?getMarketingCardsForSet({{setCode}})

querySet._comment: Early sets had 1/67 cards as foil, equating to 15/67 (~20%) chance a booster had a foil, and as of TSP it replaces a common.
